description: Add text on the document or image. Do not throw error is user has not provided any other information.

userMessage.success: Text layer added to the document.
userMessage.error: Unable to add text layer. There was an issue creating it.

params.paramDescription: Actual text provided by the user which is to be added on the image and its default value is empty string.
Font size in pixels. Default Size is 150.
RGB Red component of the text color (0-255). Default is 255.
RGB Green component of the text color (0-255). Default is 255.
RGB Blue component of the text color (0-255). Default is 255.
Horizontal position (percent, 0-100) for the text anchor. Default is 30.
Vertical position (percent, 0-100) for the text anchor. Default is 45.
